Header: Israeli troops kill one Palestinian, wound more than 200 at Gaza border protests
Content: Israeli troops shot dead a Palestinian man and wounded at least 220 others at protests on the Gaza border . The official said that a 25-year-old man had been killed and that of the 220 hurt, 90 suffered wounds as a result of live fire.At least 156 Palestinians have been killed in the protests and one Israeli soldier was shot dead by a sniper in Gaza.
